
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/hmxs/p/18749679" title="发布于 2025-03-03 23:50">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">camunda工作流实战项目【PRO版】（表单设计器+流程编辑器，零代码创建流程）</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h1 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain md-expand">pro版本主要对流程设计器、表单模块做了优化和改造，下面是各版本功能对比</span></h1>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303233945931-1281219812.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h1 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">一、整体情况介绍</span></h1>
<ul class="ul-list" data-mark="-">
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">基于ruoyi平台和camunda工作流开发而成，结合bpmn.js流程编辑器和vform表单设计器，实现常规流程零代码创建。</span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">具备流程中心的能力，支持外部任务，可协调多个业务系统协同工作，可做任务编排。</span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">具备SaaS平台的能力，支持多租户，各业务系统可作为租户，创建自己的流程，通过外部任务与自身业务代码结合，实现流程托管。并提供了页面内嵌的方案，业务系统就像使用自己系统的功能一样使用流程平台。</span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-pair-s "><strong>演示地址：</strong><span class="md-meta-i-c  md-link"><a href="http://8.140.55.122/login" rel="noopener nofollow"><span class="md-plain">http://8.140.55.122/login</span></a></span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-pair-s "><strong>详细介绍视频：</strong><a href="https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1bQ9bYuEAQ" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1bQ9bYuEAQ</a><a href="http://8.140.55.122/login" rel="noopener nofollow"><span class="md-plain"><br></span></a></span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<h1 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">二、项目特点</span></h1>
<ol class="ol-list" start="">
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">使用了功能和性能都最为强大的camunda工作流引擎</span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item md-focus-container">
<p class="md-end-block md-p md-focus"><span class="md-plain md-expand">完美集成bpmn.js流程编辑器，并做了易用性改造</span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-pair-s "><strong>重写camunda属性面板，交互效果更好</strong></span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-pair-s "><strong>支持流程完整性实时校验，防止漏配错配关键属性</strong></span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">集成开源表单设计器vform，实现动态表单回显、数据回填，并做了易用性改造</span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-pair-s "><strong>额外支持在线编码、远程文件、外部表单三种类型表单，实现全部场景、需求的表单</strong></span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">支持外部任务，易于对接其他业务系统，可作为流程中心实现调度多个业务系统在统一流程中协同工作</span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">支持动态管理监听器，可以在页面上传、查看、修改监听器源代码，并支持在线生效</span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">支持拆单、撤回、交还、委派、驳回到任意节点（<span class="md-pair-s "><strong>支持驳回到单个分支</strong><span class="md-plain">）、直接提交到驳回岗、前后加签、跳过相同审批人、进度高亮、流程提交记录、关联流程层级展示、版本管理、激活挂起、超时设置及提醒统计、<span class="md-pair-s "><strong>会签人意见互不可见、禁止撤回设置、指定节点逾期设置</strong></span></span></span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">友好且信息提示到位的流程处理界面</span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">支持多租户，具备SaaS平台的能力</span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">提供将页面内嵌到外部业务系统的方案，结合外部任务，就像使用自己系统的功能一样使用流程平台</span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">流程进度高亮显示</span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">流程节点悬浮显示代理人等信息</span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">异常节点红色高亮，显示异常信息，便于故障定位</span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">支持移动端</span></p>
</li>
</ol>
<h1 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">三、功能介绍</span></h1>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">0、首页</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">显示当前用户的相关流程信息，有快速跳转链接，例如快速发起流程和各种详情入口。<span class="md-softbreak">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain"><span class="md-softbreak"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234015924-341289316.png" alt=""></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234027704-1006018988.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">1、自定义表单</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">在线拖拽生成表单，根据不同业务场景创建不同的表单，无需编写代码。</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234036623-2022034143.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">在线编码表单</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234044621-690466159.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">远程文件，配置服务器上的vue文件静态资源的访问地址</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234052261-1772395206.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">外部表单，配置三方系统表单的访问地址</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234100675-979201383.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">2、流程模型</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">在线绘制流程图，动态配置流程发起表单、任务节点表单、处理人、监听器等，实现零代码创建流程。<span class="md-softbreak"> <span class="md-plain">对流程编辑器做了大量易用性改造，重写了camunda官方属性面板，交互更好</span></span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234109945-1607892120.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">重写了camunda官方面板，交互效果更好</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234126350-1400986769.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234137126-1095496721.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234146703-1398869592.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234156725-461087354.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234205562-655302880.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234250875-1345735181.png" alt=""></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">流程完整性实时校验，错误精准提示</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234300121-1843910373.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">3、部署管理</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">查看流程模型的部署记录，可删除部署信息<span class="md-softbreak">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain"><span class="md-softbreak"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234312846-1979246210.png" alt=""></span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">4、流程定义</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">显示对于部署的流程定义，并可对其进行激活、挂起、删除等操作<span class="md-softbreak">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain"><span class="md-softbreak"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234322561-1958202926.png" alt=""></span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">5、流程监听包</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">动态管理监听器代码，支持上传、查看源码、编辑源码、在线生效<span class="md-softbreak">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain"><span class="md-softbreak"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234333118-781162295.png" alt=""></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234337771-58003505.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">6、表单附件模板上传</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">表单中可能会用到下载模板的链接，要下载的模板可以在这个菜单维护<span class="md-softbreak"> <span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/blog_migrate/7c142e8100c7a466595b3a75966b4bde.png"><img src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/blog_migrate/7c142e8100c7a466595b3a75966b4bde.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></span></span></span></p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">7、流程发起</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">显示系统可被发起的流程，点击流程进入流程发起界面，填写流程发起表单。<span class="md-softbreak">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain"><span class="md-softbreak"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234349639-339764424.png" alt=""></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234354568-1893839663.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234401081-804719543.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">8、我的发起</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">查看我发起过的流程，可在列表页直接看到当前节点、待处理人起止时间、状态，点击详情可以查看流程发起表单信息、流程进度、处理人、提交记录、关联流程等信息。<span class="md-softbreak">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain"><span class="md-softbreak"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234417628-2081736163.png" alt=""></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234431514-1557342035.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234436349-935666221.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234440115-907925174.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234445791-196230526.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234451100-342931384.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234455569-540383661.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">9、我的待办</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">查询待办任务，点击处理进入办理界面，有超时提醒标志、发起时间、任务名称、到达时间、逾期时间等实用信息。可以做拾取、处理、交还、委派操作。<span class="md-softbreak"> <span class="md-plain">全局表单和分离式表单两类流程，表单处理时界面效果会有不同。<span class="md-softbreak">&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain"><span class="md-softbreak"><span class="md-plain"><span class="md-softbreak"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234518667-1771828779.png" alt=""></span></span></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234529236-58485433.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234622181-323839416.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">10、经办任务</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">查询我参与处理的流程<span class="md-softbreak">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain"><span class="md-softbreak"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234631288-661368627.png" alt=""></span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">11、全部流程、全部任务</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">流程管理员可以用上帝视角查看到全部流程和任务<span class="md-softbreak">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain"><span class="md-softbreak"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234651873-1396369906.png" alt=""></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234700598-1890845792.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">12、关联流程</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">当流程发生拆单或调用另一个流程时，在流程查看页面会出现关联流程选项，可以方便定位到与当前流程关联的流程<span class="md-softbreak">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain"><span class="md-softbreak"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234721582-175656545.png" alt=""></span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">13、故障信息</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">当流程某节点出现故障，流程状态会显示“存在故障”，流程进度图会将故障节点高亮显示，故障信息页签会显示故障的详细信息<span class="md-softbreak">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain"><span class="md-softbreak"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234733148-1138208083.png" alt=""></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234738449-1249538861.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234744011-1703325776.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">14、交还、委派</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234753288-746904666.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">15、流程图校验</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">对流程配置进行验证，发现基本的配置错误，并以节点高亮和鼠标悬浮显示错误信息的方式提示错误<span class="md-softbreak">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain"><span class="md-softbreak"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234802846-1506326125.png" alt=""></span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">16、任意流程拆单</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">通过配置拆弹按钮可实现任意流程拆单<span class="md-softbreak">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain"><span class="md-softbreak"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234812130-477429882.png" alt=""></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1412750/202503/1412750-20250303234816612-1456425432.png" alt=""></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain md-expand">非开源项目，若有公司或团队感兴趣，QQ: 502447474。</span></p>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>
